text: Sadaka (zakata) tam asala vica kagalam ate kamazoram la'i hai ate unham karamacari'am la'i jihare zakata de kamam la'i niyukata kite ga'e hana. Ate unham la'i jinham de dilam nu sahara zaruri hai. Isa tom ilava badi'am nu chada'una la'i ate jihare alaha de raha vica ate yatari'am di saha'ita la'i aratha dada bharana. Iha alaha valom ika hukama hai. Alaha gi'ana vala ate bibeka vala hai
